channel.title: Delta 317 How to add Login Option to Train or Instant Pk e.g ::master
channel.description:
Hey guys, I would really like for my server to have an option upon login where you can either train your stats and get double pkp points, or have the option to master and instant pk but you only obtain single pkp. I've seen it on some servers but not for delta, mainly for PI. If anyone has any idea or any guide could you please link me, I would be greatly appreciated :) Thank you.
Reiss

item.title: Delta 317 How to add Login Option to Train or Instant Pk e.g ::master
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Create a dialogue when a player logs in with two options.

There’s many ways you can handle this.

Read full topic
item.source: Delta 317 How to add Login Option to Train or Instant Pk e.g ::master
